channel.title: Localstack-Endpoints on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Localstack-Endpoints on Docs

item.title: Internal Endpoints
item.description: LocalStack provides several internal endpoints for various local AWS services and LocalStack-specific features. These endpoints are not part of the official AWS API and are available in the /_localstack and /_aws paths. You can use curl or your favourite HTTP REST client to access endpoints. You can start your LocalStack instance and go to http://localhost.localstack.cloud:4566/_localstack/swagger to browse the Swagger UI, visualize and interact with all the API’s resources implemented in LocalStack.
